---
title: "Nepal Photos"
format: html
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# List JPG/JPEG files
img_files <- list.files(
  path       = "Website flics",
  pattern    = "(?i)\\.jpe?g$",
  full.names = TRUE
)

img_files <- sort(img_files)

# Print each image with reduced size + extra spacing
for (img in img_files) {
  cat(
    "![](", img, 
    "){style='display:block; margin: 0 auto 4rem; max-width: 80%; height: auto;'}\n\n",
    sep = ""
  )
}
```
